briefTitle: Female Sexual Dysfunction in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Evaluating Female Sexual Dysfunction in Breast Cancer Patients After Mastectomy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: assessment of female sexual dysfunction in breast cancer patients after mastectomy using questionaire
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age: 18-40 years old.
* Social status: Married.
* (Performance status): Who 0-1

  * 0-Asymptomatic (fully active, able to carry on all predisease activities without restriction)
  * 1-Symptomatic but completely ambulatory (restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of light or sedentary nature. For example, light housework, office work)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant women.
* Comorbidities (Diabetes mellitus., Hypertension).
* Female genital tract disease.
